sn35.21:1.1: “Yo, bhikkhave, cakkhussa uppado thiti abhinibbatti patubhavo, dukkhasseso uppado, roganam thiti, jaramaranassa patubhavo.
sn35.21:1.6: yo manassa uppado thiti abhinibbatti patubhavo, dukkhasseso uppado, roganam thiti, jaramaranassa patubhavo.
sn35.21:2.1: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, cakkhussa nirodho vupasamo atthangamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, roganam vupasamo, jaramaranassa atthangamo.
sn35.21:2.6: yo manassa nirodho vupasamo atthangamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, roganam vupasamo, jaramaranassa atthangamo”ti.
